meanings.definition: A person who specializes in the study and identification of gemstones.
meanings.sent1: Gemologists carefully examine gemstones to determine their authenticity.
meanings.sent2: The gemologists at the museum have a vast collection of rare gems.
meanings.sent3: The gemologists at the party were like detectives searching for hidden treasures.
meanings.sent4: In the world of gemstones, gemologists are the ultimate detectives uncovering secrets of the earth.
meanings.sent5: The gemologists' workshop was filled with magnifying glasses and bright lights to inspect each gem closely.

meanings.definition: The gemologists' expertise in evaluating the quality and value of precious stones is highly sought after in the jewelry industry.
meanings.sent1: Gemologists use specialized tools to assess the worth of gemstones accurately.
meanings.sent2: The gemologists' report on the diamond's clarity was crucial for the sale.
meanings.sent3: At the gemologists' convention, everyone wanted their jewelry appraised for fun.
meanings.sent4: The gemologists' eyes sparkled with excitement as they uncovered the hidden value of the gem.
meanings.sent5: In the world of jewelry, gemologists are the true experts who bring out the beauty in every stone.
